title.rendered: We've Integrated with Zapier to Save You Even More Time

content.rendered:
Freelancers know better than anyone that time is money, which is why we’re excited to announce our new integration with Zapier, an online tool that automates repetitive tasks so you can focus on the things that matter (and get you paid).
We know Fiverr Workspace isn’t the only tool you use, so now it’s easier than ever to sync us with all of the other platforms you rely on to run your freelance business. These connections are called “Zaps,” and by activating them, you’ll save hours of time each month. That’s $ in the bank!
Here are ten Zaps you can start using immediately:
Create Dropbox folders for new Fiverr Workspace clients
Everyone needs a place for their stuff! Within this Zapier integration, you can automatically set up a storage folder on Dropbox for new clients added within AND CO.
Use this Zap ⚡
Save new Fiverr Workspace invoices to DropBox
Stop saving your Fiverr Workspace invoices in random folders. Use this Zapier integration to automatically send PDFs of your Fiverr Workspace invoices to designated Dropbox folders. That way, you can keep everything neatly organized.
Use this Zap ⚡
Subscribe new Fiverr Workspace clients to Mailchimp
As your client roster grows, it’s important to keep your CRM up-to-date. With this Zapier integration, you can automatically send any new client added in Fiverr Workspace to your MailChimp distribution list. Use this to save time and ensure your mailing list always accurate.
Use this Zap ⚡
Create Fiverr Workspace clients from Wufoo entries
This Zapier integration will automatically use new Wufoo form entries to create new clients in your Fiverr Workspace account. Ensure your client roster is always accurate—and save time doing so—with this simple integration.
Use this Zap ⚡
Post direct Slack messages for new Fiverr Workspace invoices
Keep records of your submitted invoices by setting up this AND CO-Slack integration. Once an invoice is created within AND CO, you’ll automatically receive a Slack DM copying you on the invoice created.
Use this Zap ⚡
Post direct Slack messages for Fiverr Workspace expenses
Need to track expenses in a forum like Slack, for future reference or to share with someone on your team? This Zapier integration automatically posts your Fiverr Workspace expenses to Slack.
Use this Zap ⚡
Add new Stripe customers as clients within Fiverr Workspace
Once you set up a client in Stripe, this Zapier integration will automatically add them as a client within AND CO. Why waste time doing the same thing twice? Save time and make sure your paying clients are always managed within AND CO.
Use this Zap ⚡
Create new Fiverr Workspace clients from Google Sheets
Use this Zapier integration to easily add your clients in Fiverr Workspace by adding new rows in Google Sheets. As your client roster expands, just add the client name to a new row in Google Sheets. At that point, your client will be automatically set up within AND CO, so you can invoice and manage without lifting a finger.
Use this Zap ⚡
Create Fiverr Workspace expenses from Google Sheets
Use this Zapier integration to easily track your expenses in Fiverr Workspace by adding new rows in Google Sheets. Got a business expense? Just add it as a row within Google Sheets. At that point, your invoice will be automatically sent to AND CO, and tracked alongside all of your other expenses.
Use this Zap ⚡
Add new Google Contacts to Fiverr Workspace as clients
Managing your prospect and client pipeline can be a bear. Use this Zapier integration to automatically create a new client within Fiverr Workspace each time you add a new contact to your Google Contacts account.
Use this Zap ⚡
Start exploring all of the ways you can save time at https://zapier.com/apps/and-co/.

excerpt.rendered: Fiverr Workspace has joined forces with Zapier to help you automate even more business tasks. That means less time doing desk work and more time doing what you love. Win!
